name: Fast and The Furriest: Now It's Purrsonal
name_original: Fast and The Furriest: Now It's Purrsonal
description:
This game is about racing cats against one another!  

This is an updated gamejam title in which I was a contributor.  Since the jam I've cleaned it up to get rid of bugs and get it closer to the original vision.  Also in the credits is https://larkwrighter.itch.io/!  Currently looking for a way to credit our third member, will update once I've found a way to do so!

How to Play:

Player 1's cat is Daisy, the cat on the top race track

Player 2's cat is Oscar, the cat on the bottom race track

The game starts on Player 1's turn.  During their turn, they can drag objects from the right of the course onto the field to help or hinder the cats' progress.

When Player 1 is done, they press ready.  This passes the turn to Player 2, who may now drag objects of their choosing onto the race course.  When Player 2 is done, they press Start, which begins the race.

Objects have limitations on where they can be placed.  Two objects cannot be placed immediately adjacent to one another.  

Cups of Water can only be placed on the interior of the race track.

When an object dissapears from the right, that player has hit their cap on the number of that object they can place.  

Each player's object caps are personal, Player 1 can't use all of an object and leave none for Player 2.

Different objects have different effects, experiment!  Hope you enjoy!

If you encounter bugs, do please let me know!
